title: Marginal Operation - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Mature   Psychological   Seinen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Clever Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Mercenaries   Military   Modern Day   Strategist   Wars

description: Not wanting to remain a NEET, 30 years old Arata decided to join a private military and security company. While having fun during the training and getting good scores, soon he has to face a real war.>
